page.title: 13Religion-Leeswood & district
page.content: In this area there are 11 churches & chapels which hold weekly services. Sunday school is held,but not many children and parents attend. Many children do go to church, but the vicar would like more. In 1984 one church dealt with 30 deaths,33 baptisms & 16 weddings.The church holds two holy communions a week.They are held on Sunday evenings. The churches & chapels have special services like Lent,Easter,Anniversary Gift Day,Christingle,Harvest and Youth services. About 20 people go to choir practice a week.The churches have outings in the summer holidays. At some chapels they hold Christmas parties and youth clubs.
